mapper.insert: insert into region(region_num, region_parent, region_child, region_grand_child, nx, ny) values(#{regionNum}, #{regionParent}, #{regionChild}, #{regionGrandChild}, #{nx}, #{ny})

insert into weather(region_num, weather_temp, weather_sky_status, weather_rain_status, weather_amount, weather_per, weather_date, weather_time) values(${regionNum}, #{weatherTemp}, #{weatherSkyStatus}, #{weatherRainStatus}, #{weatherAmount}, #{weatherPer}, #{weatherDate}, #{weatherTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM weather WHERE region_num IN (SELECT region_num FROM region WHERE region_child = #{regionChild} and region_grand_child = #{regionGrandChild});
